name: n8n-nodes-base.unleashedSoftware

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many sales orders

properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: customerId
options.description: Only returns orders for a specified Customer GUID. The CustomerId can be specified as a list of comma-separated GUIDs.

options.name: customerCode
options.description: Returns orders that start with the specific customer code

options.name: endDate
options.description: Returns orders with order date before the specified date. UTC.

options.name: modifiedSince
options.description: Returns orders created or edited after a specified date, must be UTC format

options.name: orderNumber
options.description: Returns a single order with the specified order number. If set, it overrides all other filters.

options.name: orderStatus
options.description: Returns orders with the specified status. If no orderStatus filter is specified, then we exclude "Deleted" by default.

options.name: startDate
options.description: Returns orders with order date after the specified date. UTC.

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a stock on hand

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many stocks on hand

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: asAtDate
options.description: Returns the stock on hand for a specific date

options.name: IsAssembled
options.description: Whether the AvailableQty will also include the quantity that can be assembled

options.name: modifiedSince
options.description: Returns stock on hand values modified after a specific date

options.name: orderBy
options.description: Orders the list by a specific column, by default the list is ordered by productCode

options.name: productId
options.description: Returns products with the specific Product Guid. You can enter multiple product IDs separated by commas.

options.name: warehouseCode
options.description: Returns stock on hand for a specific warehouse code

options.name: warehouseName
options.description: Returns stock on hand for a specific warehouse name

options.description: Use in conjunction with UseSudo. The DN that holds the password credential to be used if sudo is configured to prompt for a password when executing a command.

options.name: TempDirectory
options.description: The host directory path to hold temporary files during provisioning. For example /tmp/. The folder should have the necessary write permissions.

options.name: TrustedFingerprint
options.description: For Secure Shell (SSH) keys. The SSH server key fingerprint. If this value is set, and EnforceKnownHost is enabled, Trust Protection Platform will only successfully connect to the device if the hosts fingerprint matches this value.

options.name: UseSudo
options.description: Use in conjunction with SudoCredentialDN. For cases where the device credentials require sudo privilege elevation to execute commands when installing the certificate on a Unix or Linux device: true: Execute commands using sudo when provisioning. false: Execute commands directly without using sudo.

name: @n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.lmChatVercelAiGateway
description: For advanced usage with an AI chain via Vercel AI Gateway

properties.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI chain. Insert one
properties.name: notice

properties.displayName: If using JSON response format, you must include word "json" in the prompt in your chain or agent. Also, make sure to select latest models released post November 2023.
properties.name: notice
model
properties.description: The model which will generate the completion

properties.name: options
properties.description: Additional options to add

options.name: frequencyPenalty
options.description: Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim

options.name: maxTokens
options.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion. Most models have a context length of 2048 tokens (except for the newest models, which support 32,768).

options.name: Text
options.description: Regular text response

options.name: JSON
options.description: Enables JSON mode, which should guarantee the message the model generates is valid JSON

options.name: presencePenalty
options.description: Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the model's likelihood to talk about new topics

options.name: temperature
options.description: Controls randomness: Lowering results in less random completions. As the temperature approaches zero, the model will become deterministic and repetitive.

options.name: timeout
options.description: Maximum amount of time a request is allowed to take in milliseconds

options.name: maxRetries
options.description: Maximum number of retries to attempt

options.name: topP
options.description: Controls diversity via nucleus sampling: 0.5 means half of all likelihood-weighted options are considered. We generally recommend altering this or temperature but not both.
